DOC.brief_summary: Post marketing Surveillance to gain insights into the effects of therapy with Spiriva® (tiotropium bromide) on health-related quality of life in COPD patients who stopped smoking during treatment and to obtain safety data regarding adverse events.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Spiriva® on Health-related Quality of Life in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients Who Stopped Smoking During Treatment.
DOC.criteria: Patients with COPD Smoker at start Patients presenting with any general and specific contraindications listed in the Patient Information Leaflet ('Gebrauchsinformation') and the Basic Product Information('Fachinformation')
